name: useful-express-partials
description: A collection of useful Jade view partials for ExpressJS server: error reporting, analytics, etc.

scripts.test-with-package: with-package echo pkg.name version pkg.version description pkg.description
scripts.release: with-package git commit -am pkg.version && git tag pkg.version

author: Gleb Bahmutov <gleb.bahmutov@gmail.com>
